= jNetEdit =

=== Install ===

Download the zip *[http://slash17.googlecode.com/files/jNetEdit.zip jNetEdit.zip]*:<br>
URL: _http://slash17.googlecode.com/files/jNetEdit.zip_

Extract it in your directory: <br>
es. `# unzip jNetEdit.zip -d /home/user/jNetEdit`

Start jNetEdit:<br>
  * GNU/Linux: # sh /home/user/jNetEdit/jNetEdit.sh
  * Windows: double click on jNetEdit.bat in the main directory


===== Eclipse =====

The package contains the source code and the libraries too and is ready for eclipse;<br>
To import the project in Eclipse:

  * New → Java Projet
  * Project Name: jNetEdit
  * Create project from existing source
  * “Browse” to the directory where you extract jNetEdit (es. /home/user/jNetEdit)
  * “Finish”

To import the project from SVN with Subclipse: 

  * New → Other → SVN → Checkout Project from SVN
  * Create a new repository location 
  * URL: _http://slash17.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/jNetEdit_
  * Select the last revision: “HEAD” 
  * Next → Next → Finish


To import the project from SVN with Subversive:

  * New → Other → SVN → Project from SVN
  * Create a new repository location
  * URL: _http://slash17.googlecode.com/svn/_
  * “Browse” and select “trunk/jNetEdit”
  * “finish”
